message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10000. This is a great price considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I appreciate the deal, $10000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending.  I'd be willing to pay $8500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but $8500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9500 to make this deal work. It's a fair price considering the value of the product.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $9500 is still a bit out of my range.  Would you be willing to go to $9000?  This would be a fair price for both of us and would allow us to make a deal.
